name: SILICON SCRAMBLE
description:
SILICON SCRAMBLE is a fast-paced score attack shoot 'em up!

Self-destruct your way to victory by chaining kills and tactically exploding into enemies!

This game was made for the Gunner Parade '22 game jam!

Features:

  • A relentless 3 minute score attack stage!
  • A scoring system that directly encourages point-blanking and self-destructing to keep chains going!
  • Online leaderboards! (Downloadable version only.)

Controls (US QWERTY keyboard):

MoveArrow keys / WASDFocusLeft shiftShotZ / JSelf-DestructX / KRestartRQuitEsc

Controls (Xbox gamepad):

Move D-padFocus A, RBShot XSelf-Destruct YRestart Back / ViewQuit Start / Menu

Credits (jam team):

  • Programming: rollingcrow [itch.io, Twitter]
  • Art: Pleinair [itch.io], NoStereo [Carrd, itch.io], rollingcrow
  • BGM: Himeko Katagiri (Seifuku Sound) [Bandcamp, itch.io]
  • SFX: NoStereo
